body: But master wizard, it appears that thou hast not witnesseth death itself. I hath heard of a mutant, a well endowed mutant, that speaketh of having foreseen a great many revelations. Thus, this body wasteth not its time and quickly sought out this well endowed mutant. Alas I hath found her and I began mine own Nobel quest for information. After spying behind the grass I hath found out that she often speaketh to thin air and it was there that I hath heard her speak of such blasphemous words. That the true form of death actually resembles that... of a Loli.
But seeketh not death! Never giveth upeth! Goodeth lucketh cometh your way!
Death is on holiday in Brazil for the week, apparently the weather is nice there
Translators? Where art thou? Hear ye, I seeketh death
